meanings.sent1: The authorized person can enter the restricted area.
meanings.sent2: Only authorized personnel are allowed to access the confidential files.
meanings.sent3: The unauthorized visitor tried to sneak into the authorized section but got caught.
meanings.sent4: Her signature was the authorized stamp of approval on the document.

meanings.definition: Given permission or power to do something.
meanings.sent1: The authorized user can make changes to the settings.
meanings.sent2: She was authorized to sign contracts on behalf of the company.
meanings.sent3: The cat felt authorized to explore the entire house after being given the 'all-clear'.
meanings.sent4: His badge was like a key that authorized him to open any door in the building.
meanings.sent5: Being authorized to drive at night was a big responsibility for the teenager.
